CARDINAL . The following provisions of LAW DATE are relevant in the present case .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL(CARDINAL ) provides that a request for proceedings to be started before ORG must indicate , inter alia , the decision which the plaintiff seeks to obtain , specify the reasons for the request and indicate evidence in support .
CARDINAL . Pursuant to paragraph CARDINAL of section CARDINAL , plaintiffs are required to submit an authority for a lawyer to represent them in the proceedings before ORG .
CARDINAL . Under paragraph CARDINAL of section CARDINAL , ORG is bound by a plaintiff ’s request for proceedings to be started unless the LAW expressly provides otherwise .
